Posts.Content: Lopester wrote: I have had a "reoccurrence" 3/08 and now diagnosed "metastasis" within 2 years of double mastectomies 12/06, ovaries removed 5/07 and Aromasin therapy 7/07.  I have the BRCA II mutation and was considered a stage 1 initially as no nodes were positive and although I had 4 lesions the largest invasive was 8 mm.  I finished radiation 7/2/08.  My bone scan in March showed a small lesion on my rib, the bone scan in July showed it had grown, I had another rib that was broken and a hot spot on my skull.  The CAT in March showed "nodules" on my lung and thyroid and a possible met on my liver.  A follow up MRI says it's a possible Hemangioma on my liver - but it wasn't there in 06. I am very freaked out.  Does the Aromisin not work for me?  Do I need better doctors?  What am I doing wrong?  My oncologist was missing in action due to health issues and I had to find another.  I have a new doc at Dana Farber but she has goofed up with me a few times more than I want to mention .  I can't keep changing doctors but I am really concerned about the failure of medical oncology for me. Penelope Dx 7/15/2008, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Reoccurrence/Metastasis &Aromasin Lopester Lopester
